item.title: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled coming to Game Pass on December 4
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/crash-team-racing-nitro-fueled-coming-to-game-pass-on-december-4

Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled for Xbox One will be available via Game Pass Standard and Game Pass Ultimate starting December 4, Microsoft announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Microsoft Store:

Crash is back in the driver’s seat! Get ready to go fur-throttle with Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled. It’s the authentic Crash Team Racing experience plus a whole lot more, now fully-remastered and revved up to the max:

  • Start your engines with the original game modes, characters, tracks, power-ups, weapons and controls.
  • Power slide to glory in additional karts, tracks and arenas from Crash Nitro Kart.
  • Race online with friends and Crash the competition with online leaderboards.

With Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled, the stakes are high and the competition is fierce. It’s the Crash Team Racing you love, now kicked into the highest gear.
